response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is truly invaluable to you. Given its significance and the value it holds for you, I am confident that it would be a wise investment. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to offer this product to you at a special price of $1,250,000.

This offer represents a significant discount compared to its actual worth, aiming to make the acquisition more accessible while still ensuring a fair return on my investment. I understand the importance of such a purchase and hope that this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I am here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
